text: Melocactus lanssensianus is a species of plant in the family Cactaceae. It is endemic to Brazil. Its natural habitats are rocky areas and hot deserts. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==References== ==Sources== * Taylor, N.P. 2002. Melocactus lanssensianus. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Melocactus lanssensianus
